title: Loading Screen?? Uhh... Still loading...
body:
I've been connecting to a League game for about 30 minutes now. It turned black and crashed. Then, I tried to reconnect, but it kept saying to check my internet. After that, I tried reconnecting again. The loading screen kept me at 0% and then crashed.

Hope, I don't get a 5 Low Queue ban for this...

replies.body:
I had the same problem a while back, when the game finally did load, inevitably it was the end game screen, and i lost ip and got a leave...
Somehow riot's  hextech repair toolkit miraculously fixed it, albeit it caused a hell of a lot of damage to my internet it took me almost 3 hours to get the internet on my pc working again after i ran their software lol

A black screen while loading into a game suggest a network problem failing to load assets and reach the game server.  You should go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubelshoot and get back in game!  Let me know if you have any questions.

Thanks, I tried doing some of the stuff. So I tried to go onto a Twisted Tree Line (Normal Queue) to test it, but it ended up not working. After that, I got a Low Priority queue 5 game ban. So later I tried going on a Custom game, and I was able to connect. Unlucky..
